titles.title: More Child Care and Jobs for Military Families Act
More Child Care and Jobs for Military Families Act

To direct the Secretary of Defense to submit to the Committees on Armed Services of the Senate and House of Representatives a report on at-home child care programs of the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
More Child Care and Jobs for Military Families Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to report on at-home child care programs offered by each military department. Additionally, DOD must study and report on (1) standardizing the requirements of each military department relating to licensing and certification for at-home child care providers, (2) removing barriers to the expansion of at-home child care programs, and (3) supporting the employment of military spouses in at-home child care programs.
